oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The ttu ttutten make a nest that takes up an entire tree, although the entrance to the nest is small, as the ttu ttutten are small birds (they are the 'children of smallness'). 1) See also The story of |gwai (who killed his sister-in-law, and was killed by his brother-in-law), 2) This story is found in Book VIII-25.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Ttu ttutten (birds)
